name: Dungeons of Distrust
description:
Explore this cursed dungeon with your friend. But are you sure you can trust them, really? In this online co-op game you are about to explore some weird and mystical dungeon full of traps!

In beginning of each level you and your partner need to choose who is going to cast what spells. There are multiple spells and one of you can't take them all!

Controls

  • Use WASD to move your character
  • Slam into walls and objects to interact
  • Use your arrows to Pan your camera around the level freely
  • Escape to open pause menu
  • Use your mouse to drag and drop spells

The game can be played with controller, but I did not have time to properly implement full controller support, so Keyboard and Mouse is recommended

Known issues

  • Restarting a level causes item duplication issue. To mitigate you can edit game save data located in AppData\LocalLow\MultiplayerJam\DungeonsOfDistrust\SaveData.json
  • There is a gamebreaking issue in the Corrosion level where a bridge between two parts of the map is broken
  • After exiting to main menu there is an issue where online lobby system is broken. Restart the game to fix.
